storyInfo: Amiya and the Doctor discover that the 'Self-Salvation Corps' soldier rescued in the previous night's operation is actually a Sarkaz in disguise. Just as Feist and Rockrock struggle with their sorrow, the city defense artillery activates again and starts to bombard their location.

attributes.content: Have you finished cleaning up the streets?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Yes, General. Everyone on the list has already been dealt with.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Some tried to flee to other boroughs or leave the city just as you said, and we stopped them as well.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Only a few slipped through our net... The soldiers sent to chase after them seemingly ran into the same Sarkaz from Rhodes Island as yesterday.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Let them squirm their way underground.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: That'll make it easier for us to flush them all out at once.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: ...Multiple of our contact points above ground were attacked all at once?
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: What of our Messengers? They got taken as well?
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Doctor, I want to hear your view on this.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.options: Rhodes Island wasn't told where these points were.

attributes.content: The only ones with access to that information are our own troops.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.options: We were tailed on the way back yesterday.

attributes.content: It seems the seeds of crisis were sown last night.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: But I don't want to doubt our own soldiers.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: There's no way they'd betray their brothers and sisters.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.options: The commander is responsible for the team.;We can't overlook any hypothetical.

attributes.content: Twelve people came back with Heidi.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Among them, nine only ever provided us information on occasion.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: The other three helped us transport supplies, so it is possible they know the locations of some contact points.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.options: How many more are in Sarkaz hands?

attributes.content: ...A lot more.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Doctor, you know better than anyone how difficult last night's operation was. As much as I'd like to rescue everyone, I'm forced to admit that we're not yet strong enough.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Heidi's done good work. Being able to save all those people already went above and beyond my expectations.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.options: The Sarkaz couldn't know who would be rescued.;Unless everyone defected.;You don't place a pawn that won't be used.

attributes.content: There were a lot of uncertainties surrounding our operation last night...
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: I doubt the Sarkaz could have full control over everything.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: That's simply not possible.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: That's right.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: The Sarkaz commander isn't a fool. He would have found a way to make sure his plan succeeded.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: So, if there really were traitors among the soldiers we saved...
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: In all likelihood, they would've been the easiest for us to rescue.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.options: That narrows it down considerably.;The most obvious suspects are clear.

attributes.content: Still, I don't want to fling these accusations around about soldiers willing to bleed and die for their homeland.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: We need proof.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: How do you suppose we get that, Doctor?
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.options: Let's go visit the wounded together.

attributes.content: Why aren't you moving? The commander just sent news that Bill's about to wake up.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: ...Rockrock.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: I want to tell her that I'm stepping down as captain of the operation team.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Take a look at these.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Packages? What's inside them?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Johnny and Gabby's belongings. I picked out the stuff to send back to their families.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: What remains are their tools, weapons, and equipment. If you really... can't get them out of your head, then pick out something useful and polish it up a bit. That way they'll at least still be with us on the battlefield.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Hah...
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Sounds like the vice-captain rejected my resignation... Let's go see Bill then.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: You're awake?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Yeah.
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: Something came up, so Miss Heidi had to leave. She was originally the one in charge of coordinating the treatment of the wounded here.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Wait, you're from Mr. Feist's team. Bill, right?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Mr. Bill, should I go call Feist and Rockrock over?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Ah, no, that's alright.
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: Miss Amiya, I decided to get up to talk to you.
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: ...Huh?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Well, uh... I've always been curious about you.
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: Amiya of Rhodes Island...
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: Why do they trust you so much? You're just a Cautus in her teens.
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: Are you... talking about our operators?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We've been through so much together. You're correct that they trust me, but that trust is mutual.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: As far as I can tell, it's no different for everyone in the Self-Salvation Corps either. You also trust Feist, Rockrock, and Clovisia, right?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Haha... Mutual trust, huh? That might be a part of it. After all, you've been through your share of trials and tribulations.
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: But your authority does not come from your bloodline, nor have you taken your position by force. You are far too young to have earned the amount of trust you enjoy.
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: ...Mr. Bill?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Deep down, you've thought about these things too, haven't you? But you don't dare show it. Your fears, your worries, your anxiety... Everything is suppressed by the responsibilities they've forced onto you.
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: Are you worried about me? Did you overhear my conversation with Miss Heidi?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Mm... Maybe. I heard everything.
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: I appreciate the concern, but my responsibilities were not forced onto me.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Our operators placed their faith in me, and I am not going to let them down.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Of course... Of course. Since the very beginning, they've always been devoted to you.
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: But Amiya... When they look at you, how do you know that they're not looking right past you? Searching for another soul that has endured the twists and turns of fate?
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: Everything you believe, do you truly believe it, or...
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: Are you dreaming a dream given to you by somebody else... one that you can't wake up from no matter how much you struggle?
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: Mr. Bill... No, that's not who you are!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Who exactly are you?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Allow me to return the question.
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: Amiya... Who are you?
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.text: Amiya, do you like the stories I tell? You'll still be able to sleep well, won't you? I don't want you to have nightmares.
You won't? Oh, what a sweet child you are.
That's right, while we may look different in many ways, we are both children given life and nurtured by this great land.
Some of the stories you've heard are legends that others find terrifying, but they are indeed the history of the Sarkaz.

attributes.content: You shouldn't be here.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I see the energy gathering inside your palm. Have you not figured out who I am? Why aren't you attacking?
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: I cannot touch your emotions, 'Mr. Bill'.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But... I also cannot feel any malice.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: You could have continued pretending to be asleep, yet you said all those things to me...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Hah, didn't I already tell you? We are very curious about you.
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: If not for you, we'd have no desire to come here either. Theresis has no sway over us.
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: No matter what you're after... this is far too cruel.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Cruel...?
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: Do you mean this face we're borrowing?
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: Yes, which is why I need you to leave.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Black lines surged from her palm once more, weaving a net around the man in the Self-Salvation Corps uniform.
One strand condensed into a lightless blade, pressed against his throat.
What a... remarkably gentle threat.
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: Amiya, a lot of people have told you this before, yes?
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: You really are just like her.
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: Not another word out of you, please.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Unfortunately, you're still too immature.
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: Always be aware of your surroundings before you make a move.
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: ...Miss Amiya?!
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: You, you... you're trying to kill Bill?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: No, I...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor, I take it that you didn't ask me to bring everyone here just to see this scene?
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.options: I wanted to see who'd make the first move.;You're already looking at the 'traitor'.

attributes.content: I assume you're not referring to Amiya. Then, Bill?
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Rockrock... Rockrock, help me...
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: I'd rather die myself... than betray you!
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: Stay away from him. I... No, nobody knows the full extent of his Originium Arts.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: His words are, or rather his very existence is... dangerous.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Miss Amiya... Can I trust you?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Last night, we fought side-by-side. I thought Rhodes Island truly had our backs, just as you said.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Your expression scares me. It's as if I've seen it somewhere before...
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: That's right, you're already mourning the pain and suffering you're about to cause.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: If so, then... why? Why go through with it?!
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: She... The Sarkaz took my father from me, right before my eyes. Are you going to take my family away too?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: I'm sorry, Miss Rockrock... But it's too late. Your family member's already gone.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But, Bill's right in front of us!
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: This must be difficult... for you to accept.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...I don't understand.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Look, Amiya, it's not that we're not willing to believe you, but we don't have your Arts. We can't see what you see.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Commander... I can see it.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Captain?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: He might not actually be the same Bill we know.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: But those wounds on his body... he got all those from saving me yesterday!
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: You said it yourself, Rockrock. The Sarkaz are masters of disguise, but we can't let ourselves be fooled.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: But how...?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Look, I brought along the Metal Crab I was going to give to Bill.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: See for yourself.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Ugh, when did this thing crawl onto me?
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: He didn't even spare it a glance. The only thing in his eyes is Miss Amiya. He's so proud of having deceived us that he's long forgotten... about the bond between us.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: All because of this insignificant little machine?
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: Don't you think you're being a bit too hasty, Feist? Aren't we sworn blood brothers?
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: I've made a lot of hasty decisions these last few days.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Bill, my good man... if he were still around, he'd be ruthlessly making fun of me. I miss him. I miss him so much.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Whoever you are... Don't make me pry that mask off your face with my wrench.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Rockrock, are you going to break my heart, just like him?
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: I'll never turn my back on my family.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: But you... you're acting less and less like him.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: He would never talk like that. He would never try to manipulate us.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: ...So you really don't think I'm the real Bill? Feist, are you really okay with that?
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: I'll have you know, if so, then that means your friend died in vain.
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: Anyone else may have the right to say that, but you sure as hell don't!
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Haha. You're pretty smart, but unfortunately for you...
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: It's too late.
attributes.name: Bill

attributes.content: Artilleryman, are you ready?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Yes, General. The cannon is aimed at the target.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Remember, we're leveling every single building except the train station and the tracks.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Yessir!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Increase the output to maximum.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: M-Maximum? That might blow right through to the structural levels—
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Did you hear what the Confessarius's Messenger said? In their eyes, this whole tract of land, including the factories above, is worth nothing to us.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Then... Then, what about our people underneath...?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Hoederer will guard the safe areas under the city walls.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: But what about—
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Uhh... Who do you think is heading underground to deal with the rebels?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: The Sanguinarch?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: As long as you get it. If these toys can take HIM out, I'd be... extremely surprised.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: As for the other one...
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: I've been curious for a while now. If it came to an all-out battle with the Prince, who would come out on top?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Thank goodness you're all here—
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Huh? Why does it feel like I walked right into a fight about to break out?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Anyway Doctor, I sent up some drones like you requested— They're really about to resume! Th-They're pointing those cannons right at us!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Notify Heidi and Harmo. We're evacuating immediately.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Hold on, I'm getting a strong Originium reading! They're aiming at our current location!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: We've only got ten seconds!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Nine—
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: —Why are you holding on to me?
attributes.name: Bill?

attributes.content: You said it yourself, we're sworn blood brothers. I don't want to... pass judgment too hastily.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Captain... I don't think... I can carry the two of you...
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: I'll admit that you people are very... interesting.
attributes.name: Bill?

attributes.content: Goodbye, Captain.
attributes.name: Bill?

attributes.content: Goodbye, Rockrock.
attributes.name: Bill?

attributes.content: Bill wanted you to live on. Those were his last words.
attributes.name: Bill?
